name: ENTERING VAN forbidden unless leaving map
GHOST NAME said 3 times in bathroom before leaving map
LOCATE GHOST with Sensors (Motion and Sound) only
GHOST NAME said 3 times when first entering map
LEAVE WITH 2 of any carryable item from house
TAKE PHOTO of the van from inside the map
TAKE PHOTO of the EMF Reader with a reading of 2 or greater
EVIDENCE items unlocked alphabetically by each labelled photo taken
FLASHLIGHTS are replaced by lit candles
EVIDENCE items can't include Spirit Box or Writing Book
